channel.title: Making options menu
channel.description: Hello, I'm making that when you click a skill you'll get teleported to that area. But with melee (att, str, def, HP) I want a menu pop up saying: Teleport to what monster: Rock crabs Ogres Abbyssal Demons Dragons. does anyone know how to do that and make it teleport

item.title: Making options menu
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

Hello,
I’m making that when you click a skill you’ll get teleported to that area.
But with melee (att, str, def, HP)
I want a menu pop up saying:
Teleport to what monster:
Rock crabs
Ogres
Abbyssal Demons
Dragons.
does anyone know how to do that
and make it teleport

Read full topic
